channel.title: 317 Deob (Suggestions)
channel.description:
[b]iSoft 317 Client development:[/b] First, I understand I have a development team topic, but I am posting this here because I will get more replies about the client suggestions. I just want to know what you people would like to see in a client, my 'specialities' are client development, although I haven't showed it off very much, I can do a fine job.
[i]Details:[/i] Here's a little list of what I am not willing to add.
[ul][li]No fancy Jframe, I will use the basic one.[/li] [li]No 'New HP bars' because they look horrible.[/li] [li]No Custom models unless I can get CJ to make them ;)[/li] [li]No Recoloured items.[/li] [li]No custom Gameframes.[/li] [li]No custom mouse clicker things.[/li] [li]No cheats (Noclip, open bank, clientdrop).[/li][/ul]
[b]Added so far:[/b]
[ul][li]Latest Runescape models[/li] [li]Graphics[/li] [li]Animation (Working to improve)[/li] [li]World map[/li] [li]Website Stream[/li][/ul]
[b]Pictures[/b] Updating later.
So basically, this is just a little topic about my client development and suggestions thread, yes I will release this open source.

item.title: 317 Deob (Suggestions)
item.dc:creator: @wales_00 wales 00
item.description:
@wales_00 wrote:

I Yaa I:

plz add barrows phat and poorple whip and dclaws and fairy wands plzzzz

Learn to read before you post.

pk3r john:

Just use a blank 317 deob, or you can use my 377 cache client. The gameframe and sideicons are identical to the 317 ones, the only difference is that there’s the armor gloves, like barrows gloves, and some other models that are like 7700-9000.

I’m currently using a 317 blank deob.

[quote=“glestrts, post:8, topic:318234”]Hotkeys, (fairly simple but fun)
and hardcode a few interfaces, how about the new mage spellbook sorting with hovering.[/quote]

Sure will.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

[quote=“wales 00, post:4, topic:318234”][quote author=xxlukexx link=topic=414726.msg3052738#msg3052738 date=1260209351]
cheats, spawn object, no-clip, open bank.
[/quote]
Why would I want cheats? Sorry, that’s another thing I forgot to add to the list.[/quote]

i know, i was only joking. :P.

Read full topic

iSoft 317 Client development:
First, I understand I have a development team topic, but I am posting this here because I will get more replies about the client suggestions. I just want to know what you people would like to see in a client, my ‘specialities’ are client development, although I haven’t showed it off very much, I can do a fine job.
